atk-abh03a9:2_8: dhammā samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattantī’’ti (a. ni.
atk-abh03a9:2_9: 5.149) evamādīni hi suttāni nissāya sammitiyā vajjiputtakā sabbatthivādino ekacce ca mahāsaṅghikā arahatopi parihāniṁ icchanti,
atk-abh03a9:2_10: tasmā te vā hontu aññeyeva vā,
atk-abh03a9:2_12: tesaṁ laddhibhindanatthaṁ parihāyati arahā arahattāti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a9:2_13: Tatra parihāyatīti dve parihāniyo pattaparihāni ca appattaparihāni ca.
atk-abh03a9:2_14: Tattha ‘‘dutiyampi kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā sāmayikāya cetovimuttiyā parihāyī’’ti (saṁ. ni.
atk-abh03a9:2_16: ‘‘Mā vo sāmaññatthikānaṁ sataṁ sāmaññattho parihāyī’’ti (ma. ni.
atk-abh03a9:2_20: Sakasamaye pana imaṁ pattaparihāniṁ nāma lokiyasamāpattiyāva icchanti,
atk-abh03a9:2_22: Parasamayepi naṁ sabbasāmaññaphalesu sabbabhavesu sabbakālesu sabbesañca puggalānaṁ na icchanti.
atk-abh03a9:2_23: Taṁ pana tesaṁ laddhimattamevāti sabbaṁ laddhijālaṁ bhindituṁ puna sabbatthātiādinā nayena desanā vaḍḍhitā.
atk-abh03a9:3_0: Tattha yasmā paravādī kamena parihāyitvā sotāpattiphale ṭhitassa arahato parihāniṁ na icchati,
atk-abh03a9:3_2: Yasmā ca rūpārūpabhavesu ṭhitassa na icchati,
atk-abh03a9:3_3: kammārāmatādīnaṁ pana parihāniyadhammānaṁ bhāvato kāmabhave ṭhitasseva icchati,
atk-abh03a9:3_5: Puna daḷhaṁ katvā puṭṭho kāmabhavaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a9:3_6: Sabbasmimpi hi kāmabhave parihānikarā kāmaguṇā atthi,
atk-abh03a9:5_2: Dutiye ayonisomanasikaroto rattibhāge vā divasabhāge vā sabbadā parihāyanato paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a9:5_3: Tatiye parihānikaradhammasamāyoge sati muhuttameva parihāni nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a9:5_4: tato pubbe aparihīnassa pacchā parihīnassa ca parihāni nāma natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a9:6_0: Sabbeva arahantoti pañhānaṁ paṭhamasmiṁ tikkhindriye sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a9:6_3: Tesañhi sabbesampi parihāni na hotīti tassa laddhi.
atk-abh03a9:7_6: ‘‘catūhi satasahassehi seṭṭhī seṭṭhittaṁ karonto satasahassehi parihīne seṭṭhī seṭṭhittā parihīno hotī’’ti.
atk-abh03a9:7_7: Tato sakavādinā ekadesena parihāniṁ sandhāya ‘‘āmantā’’ti vutte sabbasāpateyyā parihīno hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a9:7_8: Tathā aparihīnattā sakavādī na hevāti vatvā atha naṁ ‘‘evameva arahāpi parihāyati ca.
atk-abh03a9:7_9: Na ca catūhi phalehī’’ti uppannaladdhikaṁ dutiyaṁ bhabbapañhaṁ pucchati.
atk-abh03a9:7_10: Paravādī seṭṭhino abhabbatāya niyamaṁ apassanto paṭijānitvā arahato catūhi phalehi parihānibhabbataṁ puṭṭho ‘‘niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’’ti (a. ni.
atk-abh03a9:7_11: 3.87) vacanassa ayoniso atthaṁ gahetvā laddhiyaṁ ṭhito sotāpattiphalato parihāyituṁ abhabbataṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a9:10_2: Tattha yasmā keci arahatova parihāniṁ icchanti,
atk-abh03a9:10_9: Sotāpannassa pana tepi sabbathāpi na icchantiyeva,
atk-abh03a9:10_11: Tattha tesaṁ laddhivasena paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca veditabbā.
atk-abh03a9:10_12: ‘‘Parihāyati anāgāmī anāgāmiphalā’’ti hi pañhasmiṁ ye anāgāmino parihāniṁ na icchanti,
atk-abh03a9:10_14: Ye pakatianāgāmino vā arahattā parihāyitvā ṭhitaanāgāmino vā parihāniṁ icchanti,
atk-abh03a9:11_1: Yaṁ panettha ‘‘sotāpattiphalassa anantarā arahattaṁyeva sacchikarotī’’ti vuttaṁ,
atk-abh03a9:11_2: taṁ parihīnassa puna vāyamato arahattappattiṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a9:12_1: Tato paraṁ ‘‘parihāni nāmesā kilesappahānassa vā mandatāya bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a9:12_3: saccānaṁ vā adassanenā’’ti evamādīnaṁ vasena anuyuñjituṁ kassa bahutarā kilesā pahīnātiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a9:12_4: Taṁ sabbaṁ uttānādhippāyameva suttānaṁ panattho āgamaṭṭhakathāsu vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh03a9:13_0: 262.Samayavimutto arahā arahattā parihāyatīti ettha mudindriyo samayavimutto,
atk-abh03a9:13_3: vasippatto jhānalābhī ceva sabbe ca ariyapuggalā ariye vimokkhe asamayavimuttāti sanniṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-abh03a9:13_4: So pana taṁ attano laddhiṁ gahetvā samayavimutto parihāyati,
atk-abh03a9:16_2: Tattha uccāvacāti uttamahīnabhedato uccā ca avacā ca.
atk-abh03a9:16_11: Tāya cetāya uccāvacāya paṭipadāya na pāraṁ diguṇaṁ yanti,
atk-abh03a9:16_12: ekamaggena dvikkhattuṁ nibbānaṁ na gacchantīti attho. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a9:16_16: Nayidaṁ ekaguṇaṁ mutanti tañca idaṁ pāraṁ ekavāraṁyeva phusanārahaṁ na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a9:17_0: Atthi chinnassa chediyanti chinnassa kilesavaṭṭassa puna chinditabbaṁ kiñci atthīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a9:17_1: Itaro tikkhindriyaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho mudindriyaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a9:17_3: Tattha oghapāsoti kilesogho ceva kilesapāso ca.
atk-abh03a9:19_0: 267.Parihānāya saṁvattantīti paravādinā ābhate sutte pañca dhammā appattaparihānāya ceva lokiyasamāpattiparihānāya ca saṁvattanti.
atk-abh03a9:19_1: So pana pattassa arahattaphalassa parihānāya sallakkheti.
atk-abh03a9:19_3: Itaropi asamayavimuttaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā itaraṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a9:19_4: Kāmarāgavasena vā pavattamānaṁ taṁ paṭikkhipitvā itarathā pavattamānaṁ paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a9:19_5: Rāgādīnaṁ pana atthitaṁ puṭṭho paṭijānituṁ na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a9:20_0: 268.Kiṁ pariyuṭṭhitoti kena pariyuṭṭhito anubaddho ajjhotthato vā hutvāti attho.
atk-abh03a9:20_3: Rāgo upacayaṁ gacchatīti bhāvanāya pahīnaṁ sandhāyāha.
atk-abh03a9:20_5: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṁ pana dassanena pahīnattā upacayaṁ na icchati.
